channel.title: What Is The Water Texture Used In Bounce?
channel.description: I have attempted to decompile the map and view it in hammer but i get terrible lag, so hopefully someone will know the texture and say it, thanks :slight_smile:

item.title: What Is The Water Texture Used In Bounce?
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
You can typically get working (not playable, but working) decompilations by disabling static props in the decompile options.

Read full topic
item.source: What Is The Water Texture Used In Bounce?

item.title: What Is The Water Texture Used In Bounce?
item.dc:creator: AsinoEsel
item.description:
try disabling visgroups n Hammer. You can make it so that it only shows world geometry and hiding entities. In fact you can hide everything EXCEPT water, too. Try again, this time it really shouldnâ€™t lag at all.

Read full topic
item.source: What Is The Water Texture Used In Bounce?
